source_sentence: 佛說灌洗佛形像經
translation: Foshuo guanshou fo xiangzi jing

source_sentence: 西晉沙門釋法炬譯
translation: Translated by the Western Jin Dynasty Translation of the Ascetic Shi Fahou

source_sentence: 爾時佛告摩訶剎頭諸天人民：「皆一心聽。」
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed Mahāsthāmaprāpta and the gods and people, All of them listen with one mind.

source_sentence: 佛言：「人身難得，無為道亦然，佛世難值。
translation: The Buddha said, A human body is difficult to find, and so is the path of nonproductivity, which is hard to meet in the Buddha's world.

source_sentence: 吾本從阿僧祇劫時，身為白衣累劫積德，每生自剋展轉五道，不貪財寶棄身施與無所愛惜。
translation: Formerly, when I was a layman for incalculably long eon, I accumulated virtue over many eons. Every time I grew up, I carried out the practices of the fivefold path and did not covet wealth or possessions. I gave away my body as alms without cherishing anything.

source_sentence: 自致為王太子，以四月八日夜半明星出時，生墮地行七步，舉右手而言：『天上天下唯吾為尊，
translation: On the eighth day of the fourth month, at midnight on the first watch of the night when the stars rose, he was born and fell to the ground for seven paces. He raised his right hand and said: I am the only honored one in heavenly realms.

source_sentence: 當為天人作無上師。』
translation: You will become the unsurpassed teacher for gods and humans.'

source_sentence: 太子生時地為大動，第一四天王，乃至梵天、忉利天王，其中諸天各持十二種香和湯雜種名花以浴太子。
translation: The first four heavenly kings, up to the Brahma gods and Trāyastriṃśa gods, each of which held twelve kinds of fragrances, mixed incense, hot water, and a variety of other famous flowers for bathing the prince.

source_sentence: 太子得成佛道，開現聖法濟度群氓。」
translation: The prince has attained the Buddha Way and revealed the noble teaching to save all the wardens.

source_sentence: 佛告諸天人民：「十方諸佛皆用四月八日夜半時生，十方諸佛皆用四月八日夜半時出家，
translation: The Buddha told the gods and people, All the buddhas of the ten directions are born on the eighth day of the fourth month at midnight.

source_sentence: 入山學道。
translation: He entered the mountain to study the path.

source_sentence: 十方諸佛皆用四月八日夜半時成佛，十方諸佛皆用四月八日夜半時而般涅槃。」
translation: The buddhas of the ten directions all become buddhas at midnight on the eighth day of the fourth month, and the buddhas of the ten directions all pass away at midnight on the eighth day of the fourth month.

source_sentence: 佛言：「所以用四月八日者，以春夏之際殃罪悉畢，萬物普生毒氣未行，
translation: The Buddha said, Therefore, it's the eighth day of the fourth month because at the end of spring and summer, after all their sins have been fully expiated, everything produces poisonous energy that hasn't yet been done.

source_sentence: 不寒不熱時氣和適，正是佛生之日。
translation: When it's neither cold nor hot, the air is calm and comfortable, which is precisely the day on which the Buddha was born.

source_sentence: 諸善男子、善女人，於佛滅後當至心念佛無量功德之力，浴佛形像如佛在時，
translation: Good men and good women, after the parinirvāṇa of the Buddha, they should wholeheartedly remember the Buddha’s immeasurable virtue by bathing him in the form of a buddha just as if he were still alive.

source_sentence: 得福無量不可稱數。」
translation: The merit they attain is immeasurable and incalculable.

source_sentence: 佛言：「我本行菩薩道時，三十六返為天王釋，三十六反作轉輪聖王，
translation: The Buddha said, When I was practicing the bodhisattva path in the past, I returned thirty-six times to be the king of gods and became the wheel-turning sage king thirty-six times.

source_sentence: 三十六返作飛行皇帝。
translation: The thirty-sixth returned to become the flying emperor.

source_sentence: 諸有佛弟子信心善意者，當念十方諸佛功德善，若以香花雜物浴佛形像者所願皆得，
translation: If there are Buddhist disciples who believe in good intentions, they should remember the virtues of the buddhas of the ten directions. If they bathe the Buddha’s images with scented flowers and miscellaneous things, all their wishes will be fulfilled.

source_sentence: 諸天龍神常隨擁護皆當證明。」
translation: The gods, dragons, and spirits will always follow and embrace them, and they'll all prove it.

source_sentence: 佛告諸弟子：「夫人身難得、經法難聞，其有天人能自減損妻子之分、五家財物，
translation: The Buddha told the disciples, “The queen’s body is difficult to find and the scriptures and teachings are difficult to hear. Gods and goddesses will be able to diminish their own wealth by losing one’s portion of what belongs to their wives and five kinds of property.

source_sentence: 用浴佛形像者，如佛在時，所願悉得。
translation: Those who bathe the Buddha's image with it will attain whatever they wish when the Buddha is present.

source_sentence: 欲求度世取無為道生生不與死會者可得，欲求精進勇猛如釋迦文佛者可得，
translation: Those who want to save the world and take the path of nonproductivity can attain it if they are born in birth and don’t associate with death; those who want to pursue vigor and boldness like Śākyamuni can attain it.

source_sentence: 欲求如文殊師利阿惟越致菩薩者可得，欲求轉輪聖王飛行教化者可得，
translation: Those who want to pursue the bodhisattva like Mañjuśrī Abhijit can attain it, and those who want to pursue the instruction of the universal ruler can attain it.

source_sentence: 欲求辟支佛阿羅漢者可得，欲求永離三惡道者可得，欲求生天上人間富樂者可得，
translation: Those who want to pursue the path of the pratyekabuddhas and arhats can attain it, those who want to permanently leave the three evil destinies can attain it, and those who want to be born in heaven or among humans with wealth and happiness can attain it.

source_sentence: 欲求百子千孫者可得，欲求長壽無病者可得。
translation: Those who want to seek a hundred children or a thousand grandchildren can obtain them, and those who want long life without illness can obtain them.

source_sentence: 世間人民貪欲如海，寧割身上一臠肉，不肯出一錢物與人。
translation: The people of the world are addicted to desire like an ocean, preferring to cut off a handful of flesh from their bodies and won't give it to someone with a penny.

source_sentence: 人生時不持一錢來，死亦不持一錢去，財物故在世間，人死當獨去憶如此苦。
translation: When he's born, he doesn't bring a coin and doesn't carry a coin when he dies; his possessions are therefore in the world, and when he dies, he'll be left alone to remember this kind of suffering.

source_sentence: 乃浴佛形像者，持是功德生死相隨，無有斷期。」
translation: Those who bathe the Buddha's form and images will maintain this merit, which follows birth and death with no limit.

source_sentence: 佛言：「若人有一善之心，作是功德者，諸天善神、天龍八部、四天王等，
translation: The Buddha said, Suppose a person has a good mind and creates this kind of merit, and the gods, good spirits, gods, dragons, eight groups, four celestial kings, and so forth.

source_sentence: 僉然擁護。
translation: It's suddenly embraced and protected.

source_sentence: 浴佛形像福報所生，常得清淨，從是因緣得成佛道(此下三十一行經文丹本所無，
translation: They bathe the Buddha's form as a reward for merit and always attain purity, and from these causes and conditions they attain the Buddha Way. (The following thirty-one lines of sūtra text are not found in the Dan edition;

source_sentence: 宋本自有，存之)。」
translation: The Song Dynasty originally existed, but it's preserved.

source_sentence: 佛言：「持好香浴佛形像者，自得其福，智在清淨功德名聞。
translation: The Buddha said, A person who holds a good fragrance and bathes the Buddha's image will attain merit for themselves, and their knowledge is pure in virtue and fame.

source_sentence: 諸持好華散佛上者，自得其福，端政好色無有雙比。
translation: Those who scatter beautiful flowers over the Buddha will attain their own merit, which is unsurpassed by anyone in terms of its appearance.

source_sentence: 諸持繒幡上佛者，自得其福，在所從生當得自然好衣無極。」
translation: Those who hold a silk banner on the Buddha's head will attain their own merit, and wherever they are born, they'll naturally attain an infinite amount of good clothing.

source_sentence: 佛言：「我累功積德行善至誠，持戒、忍辱、精進、一心、智慧，乃自致得作佛。
translation: The Buddha said, I've accumulated merit and virtue, practiced goodness and sincerity, observed precepts, forbearance, effort, unity of mind, and wisdom, which have led me to become a buddha on my own.

source_sentence: 今日賢者某甲皆為慈心好意，信向佛道欲求度脫，持種種香花浴佛形像，
translation: “Today, out of compassion and with good intentions, the venerable monk so-and-so has faith in the Buddha’s path. Wishing to seek liberation, he holds various kinds of fragrant flowers and bathes buddha images.

source_sentence: 皆為七世父母五種親屬兄弟妻子在厄難中故、為十方五道中勤苦故、為佛人民愚癡不信佛道故，
translation: It's because seven worldly parents, five kinds of relatives, brothers, wives, and children are in distress, suffering in the ten directions and five destinies, and because the Buddha's people are ignorant and don't believe in the Buddha Way.

source_sentence: 令其後世生為人，端好潔白眾人所敬，塵垢不著身。
translation: It causes them to be born as human beings in later generations, who are respected by the people because they're so beautiful and white that dirt doesn't stick to their bodies.

source_sentence: 在所從生，常與佛會；
translation: Wherever they are born, they always associate with buddhas.

source_sentence: 在所從生，常與法會；
translation: Wherever they are born, they always associate with the Teaching.

source_sentence: 在所從生，常與比丘僧會。
translation: Wherever he was born, he always held assemblies with monks and nuns.

source_sentence: 令某甲明經，智慧曉了，佛十二部經、四阿含、安般守意、三十七品、四意止、四意斷、四神足、五根、五力、七覺、八直行道，
translation: I will cause you to understand the twelvefold scriptures of the Buddha, the four Āgamas, the thirty-seven chapters of the Abhidharma-mahāvibhāga, the four kinds of supernormal powers, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven forms of enlightenment, and the eightfold path of direct practice.

source_sentence: 若能至心求佛道者，疾得阿惟越致。
translation: If someone can sincerely seek the Buddha Way, they'll quickly attain abhidharma.

source_sentence: 「令其得佛三十二相，八十種好紫磨金色。
translation: It causes them to attain the thirty-two characteristics of the Buddha, with eighty kinds of beautiful purple and polished gold.

source_sentence: 十種力、四無所畏、十八不共。
translation: The ten powers, four fearlessnesses, and 18 distinctive characteristics.

source_sentence: 口出八種音聲，飛行洞視在所至到。
translation: Eight kinds of sounds emerged from his mouth, and he flew through the cave to wherever he arrived.

source_sentence: 諸天、龍、鬼神、鬼子母官屬擁護其身，令行出入當得安隱。
translation: The gods, dragons, ghosts, spirits, and the mothers of ghosts will protect their bodies, so that they'll be safe as they go in and out.

source_sentence: 若行山中不逢虎狼，若入軍旅不被兵甲，若行江湖不逢風波。
translation: If he travels in a mountain, he won't meet a tiger or wolf, if he enters an army and isn't covered with weapons, and if he travels in a river, he won't encounter a windstorm.

source_sentence: 令床上無有病瘦者，當令縣官無呼召者，有妻子女產生難令得安隱。
translation: If there's no illness and thinness on the bed, you must cause the magistrate to have no caller, and if there's a wife or daughter who has difficulty producing it so that they can attain peace.

source_sentence: 若行賈販財利百倍，眾邪惡氣不得妄干，水火盜賊怨家債主不得妄害。
translation: If someone engages in the business of selling goods for a hundredfold profit, they won't be allowed to do so because of various evil and bad tendencies, and water, fire, thieves, thieves, enemies, debtors, and creditors won't be allowed to do so.

source_sentence: 口舌消滅皆令厭伏，令其精進莫得中悔，行如菩薩得道如佛。」
translation: When their mouth and tongue cease, they all become disillusioned and cause their effort not to attain middling repentance, practice as a bodhisattva and attain the path as a buddha.

source_sentence: 佛說灌洗佛形像經
translation: Foshuo guanshou fo xiangzi jing

source_sentence: 此經宋藏題云摩訶剎頭經聖堅譯，今按《開元錄》，宋藏錯亂，故依丹本改為灌洗佛形像經，
translation: This sūtra was translated by the Song dynasty titled Mahāsadhātu-sūtra, which is a translation of the Sanskrit word mahāsattva (maheṣa). It is now according to the Kaiyuan lu. Because the Song dynasty’s collection of scriptures has been in disunity and confusion, we have changed the Sanskrit text from the Dan one into the

source_sentence: 法炬譯。
translation: It's a translation of the Dharma torch.

source_sentence: 又宋藏此經初首即云「摩訶剎等乃至二紙經文」，全是《摩訶剎頭經》文，
translation: Furthermore, the first part of this sūtra in the Song canon says, Mahāsaka and so forth, up to the text of two-page scriptures, which is all the text of the Mahāsaka-sūtra.

source_sentence: 二經不殊。
translation: The two sūtras are not different.

source_sentence: 今依丹本，以爾時佛告摩訶剎頭乃至從是因緣得成佛道等二紙遆之。
translation: Now, according to the Dan edition, it's because at that point the Buddha addressed Mahāsādatta and from these causes and conditions he attained the Buddha Way, and so forth.

source_sentence: 從佛言浴佛形像已下三十一行經文，於宋本中本自有之，而今仍存。
translation: The text of the thirty-line sūtra below the Buddha's name and image of bathing Buddha is found in the Song dynasty, which originally had it in its own right but still exists.
